Title: TYPO3 Security Misconfiguration in Frontend Session Handling
Description: It has been discovered session data of properly authenticated and logged in frontend users is kept and transformed into an anonymous user session during the logout process. This way the next user using the same client application gains access to previous session data.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.7.27, all versions starting from 9.0.0 before 9.5.8
NotImpacted: All versions before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.7.27 before 9.0.0, all versions starting from 9.5.8
